Description: Rectangular wooden scribal palette made up of 2 layers of wood(now separated); two wells and groove for holding pens; remains of pigment.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 231)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr David George Hogarth
